name: halation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an effect caused by an image in a photograph or on a screen spreading beyond its usual edges because of the way the light reflects off the object: We tried to take a picture of the moon last night, but halation made every attempt look like nothing more than a white blur. The film is made with a special layer that is supposed to reduce halation.
More examplesFewer examplesThe halation in the photo made you look like a saint. Halation tends to be more of a problem with film cameras rather than digital photography.
